Hi again Jen,

Just a quick update to confirm everything’s been taken care of:
  • Access removed for all users highlighted in yellow across Trades, Syd, Mel, and Novari sites
  • For Ben Rookes and Mikaela Camilleri: only Ben Rookes currently has access, limited to the Mel site
  • lmclennan@novaricollective.com (Trades) and mandy@advantagestyling.com.au (Syd) couldn’t be removed as these accounts are configured with BlogVault to access your WordPress site admin

I’ve also attached an Excel file showing the existing users in each site for your reference.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to review or adjust, just let me know, always happy to help!

Hey Jen,

Thanks for sending this through.

Please note we’ll go ahead and remove access for everyone highlighted in yellow.

We’ll also double-check the list to make sure it includes everyone who should be there, especially Ben Rookes and Mikaela Camilleri.

I’ll confirm back once that’s all sorted.

In the meantime, if any other concerns come up, just let me know. Always happy to help.
hey @adriane - please reply to this and say that you got their message, make sure to transfer ownership of files to an active person 🙏
